## **Common FAQ**

**Q: Is your Taipain Taiwan locaiton optimized for China/Asia?**
A: Yes we offer great peering on our Premium netowrk to China and other parts of Asia!


**Q: Do you offer ddos Protection?**
A: Yes, all our hosting plans come with DDoS Protection included(excluding Taiwan) into the price. Our inhouse DDoS Mitigation can filter Attacks up to 500+ Gbps.

**Q: Do you block any ports?**
A: We block the most common ports used for DDoS and SPAM abuse. For mor information please visit our [website](https://softshellweb.com/vps-hosting)

**Q: Can I Install a Custom OS ISO Available?**
A: Yes, you can upload your Custom OS ISO Available inside the Virtualizor control panel. 

**Q: Does SoftShellWeb have any reviews?**
A: Yes! You can find plenty of SoftShellWeb reviews on the low end community inside our past offer discussions. 

**Q: Are there any hidden charges?**
A: No! Not with us, there are no hidden charges with any of SoftShellWeb's services or products. 

**Q: Where are the servers located?**
A: The servers are located in Wormer, Netherlands, San Jose, California and Taipei, Taiwan. 

**Q: Is SoftShellWeb a reseller?**
A: No, SoftShellWeb is not a reseller. We own all of our equipement and constantly expanding our capacities.

**Q: Do you offer a money back guarantee?**
A: Yes, we offer a 7 day money back gurantee on our Special Plans. Try us 100% Risk Free!

**Q: Can I have adult content on my website?**
A: Yes this is fine as long as it is legal within the EU and USA, however we do not allow adult content to be hosted in Taiwan. 

**Q: Do you have an affiliate program?**
A: Yes! We offer a very competitive 10% recurring commission affiliate program; check out more details at https://www.softshellweb.com/affiliate

**Q: My order has been marked as Fraud?**
A: Please open a support ticket, our staff will manually review your order.

---

**Payment Methods:** PayPal, Alipay, Debit/Credit Card, BitCoin, UnionPay, WebMoney, Moneta, QIWI, India Netbanking, iDeal, SOFORT Banking, DOKU, DragonPay, Boleto, Banco do Brasil, Alfa-Click, Malaysia e-banking, Pago Fácil, Rapi Pago, Red Pagos, Bancontact.

Join our [Affiliate Program](https://softshellweb.com/affiliate") and earn a **recurring 10% commission!** Once your referral purchases or renews a hosting plan, you will earn a 10% commission!

If you have any questions please don't hesitate to contact us. You can reach out to us via Live Chat, ticket support or email. You can open a ticket [here](https://softshellweb.com/client/submitticket.php) or you can send us an email to sales@softshellweb.com.
